summary: Skelos_Weapons are beautiful (Ebony) weapons you can make (blacksmith) yourself. As these weapons come in, varying levels of (built-in) enchantment and can be sharpened / improved even further - you will have choice of crafting them to fit your own preferences / specifications.
descriptionHtml:
---README---

for DALLs - Skelos_Weapons

v1.1

12/05/2012

Skelos_Weapons are beautiful (Ebony) weapons you can make (blacksmith) yourself. As these weapons come in, varying levels of (built-in) enchantment and can be sharpened / improved even further - you will have choice of crafting them to fit your own preferences / specifications.

Story: On your travels you have come in possession of fabled n very much feared Book of Skelos - ancient magical tome - which beside many other - now long time forgotten - arcane formulas and spells contains (blacksmith crafting) recipes for enchanted weapons made of ultimate arcane material - Ebony. These - new to game - crafting recipes require only you (smithing ability) to know how to make/craft Ebony arms n armor. Any blacksmith forge will do and crafting materials required (for arms manufacturing) are standard / in-game fare. 

These weapons are more powerful n (visually) much better balanced than anything else you can find in the vanilla game but two of them stand head n shoulder above all other - namely Skelos Bow and notorious Skelos - Ebony Katana. In my opinion - these unique (Ebony) weapons are as desirable as they are beautiful.

If you like, their look and you want other (in-game) Ebony weapons to look same check / use my (textures only) Ebony_Weapons mod.

To install you need to navigate to your Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim - game folder and paste / drag n drop in it my Data (mod) folder. Allow overwrite!    

If you don\'t like them, simply delete / remove my (mod) .esp and files from Data/DallsGear/weapons/ebony (meshes n textures).

Bugs/conflicts: none known.

Note on v1.1: New Skelos (bow) and Skelos Dragonbone Arrows added. I was kind of hopping to add here my old Oblivion bow - Skelos - which I have in my game as Dragonbone Skelos - but as its Skyrim model is still off (public use) limits - instead you are getting here my brand-new (Quicksilver) Skelos - ultimate Skyrim bow which is based on different bow mesh (model). If serious Archer I think, you\'ll love it! ;)

Use:
Free to use but if any files included (therein) are to be used for modding ask me for permission!

Enjoy and try to remember - if you like it even in a part - to give endorsement! 

Thanks to Bethesda for really great game.
author: Dall
